## Element.GetAttribute method

Retrieves an attribute value by name.

```csharp
public string GetAttribute(string name)
```

| Parameter | Type | Description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| name | String | The name of the attribute to retrieve. |

### Return Value

Returns attribute value
